short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access your frequently visited websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever found yourself caught in the web of endless chat messages, desperately searching for that crucial link shared with you? I have been there too, and that’s exactly what inspired the creation of QuickLinkings-a chrome extension.

It simply provides you a virtual VIP pass to your frequently visited sites.. Save time, stay organized, and make browsing a breeze!

The Motivation Behind QuickLinkings:
Picture this: You’re in the midst of a busy workday, and suddenly, you want to access a crucial link . It could be an work update sheet, a learning portal for training sessions, or a reference document essential for your tasks. The pressure is on, but the struggle is real — scrolling, searching, and switching for the links in chat where the link is shared initially.

That’s where QuickLinkings can be your go-to solution for a smoother workday. 🚀

Features
Effortless Retrieval: 🕵️‍♂️ No more digging through chat logs or external documents. Quick Linking brings your frequently used links to the forefront, ready for instant access.

Real-Time Convenience: 🚀 Receive a link in chat? With QuickLinkings, you can swiftly add it to your collection without missing a beat.

Other features: 🌐 Our Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your browsing experience, ensuring you have your essential links at your fingertips, without disrupting your workflow. You can edit , delete and add endless links.

Organized Accessibility: 🗂️ Tired of scattered bookmarks? Quick Links presents your favorite links in a clean column, ensuring a clutter-free and efficient browsing experience.
